name: Full Ascend
description:
Full Ascend is a platformer made in godot with a focus on looping levels and having a circular structure. The main goal of the game is to ascend from your underground village to get to the surface. 

CONTROLS:

Left/A/Left Stick Left: walk left

Right/D/Left Stick Right: walk right

Spacebar/Xbox A: Jump

E/R2: slide on wall/grab vines

E/D-pad Up: Interact/pickup objects
